title: Red Potion
summaries: The Red Potion is a potion which can be found in Chests in drunk worlds (3.33*1/30 (3.33%) chance) and "For the worthy" worlds (10*1/10 (10%) chance). It can also be dropped by Jungle Mimics, which spawn in Celebrationmk10 worlds.
It inflicts the following <linked>debuffs</linked> for 1 hour / <linked>2 hours</linked> / <linked>3 hours</linked> on the player who consumed it:

Consuming a Red Potion in a "For the worthy" world will instead grant up to three of the following <linked>buffs</linked> (a random one is chosen for each checking, so one effect may be chosen multiple times, which results in fewer effects) for 30 minutes each.
